Chemistry

Chemistry OpenCMIS

OpenCMIS is an open source implementation of the OASIS CMIS specification for Java.

User and developer documentation for OpenCMIS is available in the main Chemistry website

In this site you can find instead OpenCMIS developer information for this version (see top right corner) like:

  • Info for all OpenCMIS modules available in this release (see menu on the left)
  • Full JavaDocs
  • Aggregated unit + integration test reports for the full OpenCMIS framework
